labels.analysis: The MCP Server described is focused on enabling users to write notes directly to their Flomo account from other applications. It automates the note-taking process by providing a simple integration that captures and sends text content as Flomo entries. The core function is to streamline and automate the workflow of saving notes to a specific note-taking service, Flomo.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Daily Productivity" is chosen because note-taking is a fundamental aspect of personal organization and workflow optimization. "Memory Management" is a secondary label since it involves storing and retrieving notes, which is a form of knowledge management. No custom label is needed as the server's functionality fits well within the predefined categories.

server_info_crawled.name: Flomo Note Writer
server_info_crawled.author: @chatmcp/mcp-server-flomo
server_info_crawled.overview: Write notes directly to Flomo from your applications. Easily capture and send text content as notes to your Flomo account using a simple MCP server integration. Streamline your note-taking workflow by automating Flomo entries.

tools.name: write_note
tools.description: Deploy Server Flomo Note Writer @chatmcp/mcp-server-flomo Try in Playground

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@chatmcp/mcp-server-flomo/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
